text: The 2008 IIHF Division I World Championship was an ice hockey tournament under the authority of the International Ice Hockey Federation. It was contested from April 13–19, 2008. The tournament was played amongst two separate groups, with the best team in each group, Austria and Hungary, advanced to the top- level championship in 2009. The bottom teams in each group, South Korea and Estonia, were relegated to the lower-level Division II. Group A's tournament was held in Innsbruck, Austria.
